channel.title: Blog on www.vCrocs.info
channel.description: Recent content in Blog on www.vCrocs.info

item.title: Thursday Nights
item.description: Every Thursday night you can come to the Shotgun Range and Pratice your Bunker Trap skills or shoot Bunker for the first time. Always a good time at the range…

item.title: Hugo
item.description:
I have reviewed and tried a lot of different ways to create a personal Blog so that I can share Code, Knowledge, Pictures and do Reviews. After spending some time with Hugo it has become the framework that I have liked the most. The Theme “Hugo Future Imperfect” is also the Hugo Theme that I have liked the most.
Some of the ways I have reviewed creating a Blog require a monthly fee to host the web site for you.

item.title: Automated Clay Thrower
item.description: Raspberry PI Powered Clay Thrower Link to my Raspberry PI powered Clay Thrower. The first project I ever did with a PI. My first project using Python and PHP.
